tests.title: Verify if user is unable to login with empty credentials such as username and password
tests.fullTitle: Verify login functionalities of Swag Labs Test the login with incorrect credentials Verify if user is unable to login with empty credentials such as username and password
tests.code:
await driver.findElement(By.className("error-button")).click()
      // Clear the username and password inputs for next it block
      await clearInput("user-name")
      await clearInput("password")
      await driver.findElement(By.id("login-button")).click()
      let validationMessage = await driver.wait(until.elementLocated(By.xpath("//h3[@data-test='error']")))
      assert.strictEqual(await validationMessage.getText(), "Epic sadface: Username is required")

await driver.wait(until.urlIs("https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html"), 10000); // Wait until redirected to inventory page
